Plot: Julie, a girl from the valley, meets Randy, a punk from the city. They are from different worlds and find love. Somehow they need to stay together in spite of her trendy, shallow friends.

Title: Fast Times at Ridgemont High
Actors: Sean Penn, Jennifer Jason Leigh, Judge Reinhold, Robert Romanus
Plot: A group of Southern California high school students are enjoying their most important subjects: sex, drugs, and rock n' roll.

Title: Best of Times
Writer: Bob Arnott, Carol Hatfield, Lane Sarasohn
Actors: Crispin Glover, Jill Schoelen, Nicolas Cage, Julie Piekarski
Plot: Here's the lives of 7 teenage friends in 1981, singing, dancing and breaking the 4th wall.
